text: Norðleoda cynges gild is XXX þusend þrymsa: fiftene þusend þrymsa bið þæs wergildes, XV þusend þæs cynedomes; se wer gebirað magum & seo cynebot þam leodum.
<Arcebiscopes> & æþelinges wergild is XV þusend þrymsa.
Holdes & cyninges heahgerefan IIII þusend þrimsa.
Ceorles wergild is CC & LXVI þrimsa, þæt bið II hund scillinga be Myrcna lage.
And gif Wilisman geþeo, þæt he hæbbe hiwisc landes & mæge cyninges gafol forðbringan, þonne bið his wergild CXX scillinga.
And gif he ne geþeo buton to healfre hide, þonne si his wer LXXX scillinga.
And gif he ænig land næbbe & þeah freoh sy, forgilde hine man mid LXX scillinga.
And gif ceorlisc man geþeo, þæt he hæbbe V hida landes to cynges utware, & hine man ofslea, forgilde man hine mid twam þusend þrimsa.
And þeah he geþeo, þæt he hæbbe helm & byrnan & golde fæted sweord, gif he þæt land nafað, he bið ceorl swa þeah.
And gif his sunu & his sunu sunu þæt geþeoð, þæt hi swa micel landes habban, siððan bið se ofsprinc gesiðcundes cynnes be twam þusendum.
And gif hi þæt nabbað, ne to ðam geþeon ne magon, gilde man cirlisce.
